code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import'../styles/components/pages/NovedadesPage.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const NovedadesPage=()=>{const[novedades,setNovedades]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const cargarNovedades=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get('http://localhost:3001/api/novedades');setNovedades(response.data);}catch(error){console.error('Error al cargar novedades:',error);}};cargarNovedades();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"novedades-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"novedades-titulo",children:"\uD83D\uDCF0 Novedades"}),novedades.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("article",{className:"novedad-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:item.titulo}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:item.subtitulo}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:item.cuerpo})]},item.id))]});};export default NovedadesPage;
